name: Yveltal
flavorText:
When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and
tail feathers spread wide and glow red,
it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

previous.name: Xerneas
previous.flavorText:
Legends say it can share eternal life.
It slept for a thousand years in the form
of a tree before its revival.
previous.formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Xerneas is always in Neutral Mode outside of battle, and Active Mode in battle.

pokemon.name: Yveltal
pokemon.flavorText:
When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and
tail feathers spread wide and glow red,
it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
